original_text: And it came to pass, as soon as Isaac had made an end of blessing Jacob, and Jacob was yet scarce gone out from the presence of Isaac his father, that Esau his brother came in from his hunting.
korean_text: 이삭이 야곱에게 축복하기를 마치매 야곱이 그의 아버지 이삭 앞에서 나가자 곧 그의 형 에서가 사냥하여 돌아온지라

sentences.original_text: as soon as Isaac had made an end of blessing Jacob
and Jacob was yet scarce gone out
from the presence of Isaac his father
that Esau his brother came in
